headline: Overcoming Struggles  To Regain His Footing  And Thrive in Tech
abstract: Five years ago, Darius Jones had trouble coming up with subway fare. Today, he is an I.T. analyst for one of the worldâ€™s most exclusive luxury brands.
lead_paragraph: In late 2014, Darius Jones arrived at a computer training class in the Bronx soaking wet. He could not afford a MetroCard and had to walk in the rain.
keywords: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
Community Service Society of New York
